divs: sighting detailson july 26 th, 2013, at 10:50 pm central time. i was sitting with my wife in our back yard patio just relaxing. i was admiring the sky\stars at night. watching planes fly, and trying to figure out the certain constellations. all of a sudden, right in my field of vision, facing south\south west , a star made a super white bright flash, and took off going up at 45 degree angle leaving a white trail as it sped off going up. it lasted a total of 2-3 seconds at most. my wife, who was looking up also, did not see a thing.
Summary: I was sitting in back yard looking at the stars. Bright flash, speed off super fast going up
trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around July 26th 2013
